ygData.subject: Re: Battle in South Africa (Complete Version)
ygData.msgSnippet: KSL just informed me that Manterror shot at Kluster, and no at Chordate (Chordate wasn t even outside), so here s what my last post ... Kluster raises a hand

KSL just informed me that Manterror shot at Kluster, and no at 
Chordate (Chordate wasn't even outside), so here's what my last post 
with Kluster should have been:

::Kluster::

Kluster raises a hand to protect himself from the ion disks, but ends 
up nearly losing that hand as they cut through half of it. He growls, 
firing back up at Manterror.
